text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Thank you for your hard work♪

O-Oh, thank you.
I'm sorry for calling you out of the blue.

No worries at all~
So, what's up?

Ah, Mei is going to be teamed up with two other
members, and I wanted to tell you about them──
──Wait a moment, Producer-san!
Wh-what's up?

Wouldn't it be more fun as a surprise? Like, go
without any prior info until the first meeting~
I see... well, that's fine too, but...

...Mei, 
you look like you want to know a bit more, though?

Ahaha, caught me~!
Okay then... just a little!

Haha, got it.
Alright, just names and ages then.

The first one is 'Asahi Serizawa', aged 14,
and the other one is 'Fuyuko Mayuzumi', aged 19.

Oh~! So,
they're not the same age, huh~
Ah, feeling a bit anxious?

No way~
It's just pure excitement~!

Haha, figured as much from you, Mei. By the way, do
you think it's better not to tell them too much about you?

Yeah, maybe~ It'd be better to tell them
when we meet for the first time~
There's also "that thing" to consider, right?
